alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:04AM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 9 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
